Edges-Sanctuary -- Male Finnar Human Seasoned Woodsman
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d12 Strength: d4 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes: Doubting Thomas: -2 vs. supernatural horror
Skills (18 Points):
Boating: (agi) d4 Lockpicking: (agi) d4 Survival: (sma) d6
Climbing: (str) d4 Repair: (sma) d4 Swimming: (agi) d6
Healing: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4 Tracking: (sma) d6
Knowledge (Language (Taiga Elf)): (sma) d6 Streetwise: (sma) d4 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Skill Notes: Black Sheep: -2 Charisma (heahwisards)
Size: 0 Deity: Ertha
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 14 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 2; Skill: 6
Description Notes: Diverse: +2 Improvement Points (edge or skills)
Features
Edges (1 points): Sanctuary Hindrances: Black Sheep; Doubting Thomas; Sea Fear; Wanted Finnar Human Features: Diverse
Feature Notes:
Black Sheep: Ostracized by magocratic nobility
Sanctuary: Prepared location grants +2 Will, +2 vs. Fear, and +1 Healing after four days
Sea Fear: Must roll vs. fear within sight of large body of water
Wanted: Has trouble with distant law or minor infractions
Combat
Parry: 4 (2) Cover: 2 Toughness: 7 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Blessed Robes Shield: Large Shield Weapons: Great Sword (d4+d10); Lance (d4+d8); Short Sword (d4+d6); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Great Sword Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
